name: Dragon Spirit - The New Legend [NES]
description:
Spirit Tracks have long protected the kingdom from evil. But when they
start disappearing mysteriously, Link and Zelda must travel together to
restore them and keep the dark forces at bay. Fight enemies and explore
the world as you travel by train and take control of a hulking suit of
armor!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
